item.title: Hey, I am William Hearn!
item.description: I am an Senior Cloud Architect / Open Source advocate currently working at Statistics Canada.

Resume
item.description: Table of Contents Highlights Open Source contributions on GitHub (Current) Senior Technical Architect (IT-04) at Statistics Canada (Current) Senior Drupal Technical Architect (IT-03) at Statistics Canada (Previous) Presentations Education Work Awards Public Service Excellence Award 2014 Team of the Year Award 2014 GTEC Winner 2014 GTEC Honoree 2013 A+ Certified Professional References Highlights Open Source contributions on GitHub (Current) canada-ca-terraform-modules Azure Kubernetes Service // Infrastructure / Platform IBM Kubernetes Service // Infrastructure / Platform wxt Composer Project for Drupal WxT WxT Installation Profile Helm for DrupalWxT statcan Charts Data Analytics as a Service GateKeeper Policies Kubeflow Containers Kubeflow Manifest Senior Technical Architect (IT-04) at Statistics Canada (Current) Technical Architect of Cloud Native team at Statistics Canada Developed Concept of Operations for Kubernetes Cloud Native Platform used internally and shared with other departments Recieved Authority to Operate (ATO) for Kubernetes Cloud Native Platform through met Security Controls Recieved GCEARB approval for Kubernetes Cloud Native Platform Senior Drupal Technical Architect (IT-03) at Statistics Canada (Previous) Launched the Statistics Canada Portal on Drupal Launched Open Government Portal on Drupal Presentations Presented the Data Analytics as a Service Platform at Stratosphere 2020 PDF / YouTube Presented a two day course at the School of Public Service’s Digital Academy on Cloud Native technologies PDF / YouTube Education Honors, Bachelor of Computer Science, Carleton University // Minor in Psychology // September 2006 â€“ August 2010
